mapper.insert: insert into accom( business_id, accom_name, accom_category, accom_photo, accom_location, accom_address, accom_hashtag, accom_latitude, accom_longitude, accom_info ) values ( #{business_id}, #{accom_name}, #{accom_category}, #{accom_photo}, #{accom_location}, #{accom_address}, #{accom_hashtag}, #{accom_latitude}, #{accom_longitude}, #{accom_info} )
mapper.select: select * FROM accom A JOIN room B ON A.accom_num = B.accom_num where A.accom_num=#{accom_num};
